title: Ariceleo Led Fairy Lights Battery Operated, 1 Pack Mini Battery Powered Copper Wire Starry Fairy Lights for Bedroom, Christmas, Parties, Wedding, Centerpiece, Decoration (5m/16ft Warm White)
descriptions:
Ariceleo LED Fairy Lights Battery Operated – Warm White, 16 ft, 50 LEDs, Copper Wire

Bring a cozy glow to any space with Ariceleo’s battery-operated fairy lights. These mini, rice-grain-sized LEDs cast a warm white light across a flexible, ultra-thin copper wire that’s easy to shape for endless decorating possibilities.

Key features:
- 16 ft (5 m) string with 50 bright micro LEDs in warm white.
- 360-degree viewing angle for uniform, all-around sparkle.
- Ultra-thin, bendable copper wire: easy to shape, mold, and wrap around decor.
- 4-inch spacing between LEDs for balanced illumination.
- Clear, small battery box with 12-inch lead cable: simple to hide in displays.
- Battery operated: uses 3 AA batteries (not included).
- Energy efficient with no heat problems—safe to touch and ideal for long use.
- Waterproof wire for versatile indoor and certain outdoor uses (keep battery box dry).
- Sturdy construction designed for repeated setups and shaping.

Perfect for:
- Bedroom ambience and headboards
- Weddings and receptions
- Holiday and Christmas decor
- Parties and photo backdrops
- Centerpieces, wreaths, garlands, and DIY crafts

What’s in the pack:
- 1 pack Ariceleo LED Fairy Lights (16 ft/5 m, 50 LEDs, warm white)
- Clear, compact battery box (3 AA batteries required; not included)

Why you’ll love them:
- Subtle, starry effect from rice-grain LEDs
- Flexible copper wire that holds its shape
- Easy to hide battery box for clean, professional-looking displays
- Reliable, energy-efficient illumination without heat issues

Customer care:
- Professional after-sales support available.
- Returns accepted via Amazon; contact customer service for assistance.

Light up your moments with effortless, elegant sparkle from Ariceleo.
